ad_text: Lentz Carrier Company Sponsored Lentz Carrier Company is hiring for pneumatic tanker drivers. Pneumatic experience is not required as training will be provided. Product is non-hazmat and does not require tanker endorsement. Must have two years of verifiable Class A driving experience. We offer paid training, health insurance, dental insurance, vision insurance, AFLAC, life insurance, paid vacation, and a $1200 sign on bonus. Call our office for more details at (501) 354-6769 ext. 21. Complete our online application at https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/lentzcarrier FULL-TIME · MORRILTON, ARKANSAS Class A CDL Over-the-Road Truck Driver Apply now
